channel.title: Rstudio on Arjun Jayaprakash
channel.description: Recent content in Rstudio on Arjun Jayaprakash

item.title: R for engineers - Basics
item.description: This is the first post in a series of posts where I go over some R syntax useful for engineers. I am in no way an expert in R programming, but have been using it to read, analyze and visualize the data I obtain from both physical experiments as well as simulations. The R coding I will be discussing may therefore not be the most efficient way to solve problems.
